executive_summary: Implementation of Galaxy Defender as a pure HTML/JavaScript client-side game featuring a rocket ship that follows mouse cursor horizontally while avoiding asteroids and UFOs descending from the top of the screen. The game includes star collection for scoring, collision detection for game over conditions, and progressive difficulty increase every 10 seconds.

tasks.description: Create basic HTML structure and canvas setup
tasks.requirements: Set up HTML document with canvas element for game rendering, basic styling, and responsive design
tasks.test_criteria: HTML file loads correctly, canvas is visible and properly sized

tasks.description: Implement game initialization and canvas context
tasks.requirements: Initialize canvas 2D context, set up game dimensions, and create basic game loop structure
tasks.test_criteria: Canvas context is accessible, game loop runs at consistent frame rate

tasks.description: Create player rocket entity with mouse following
tasks.requirements: Implement rocket ship (🚀) that follows mouse cursor horizontally, constrained to canvas boundaries
tasks.test_criteria: Rocket moves smoothly with mouse cursor, stays within horizontal canvas bounds

tasks.requirements: Create system to spawn asteroids (☄️), UFOs (🛸), and stars (⭐) that descend from top of screen at high speed
tasks.test_criteria: Objects spawn randomly at top, move downward at appropriate speeds, despawn when off-screen

tasks.requirements: Implement collision detection between player rocket and all falling objects (asteroids, UFOs, stars)
tasks.test_criteria: Collisions are accurately detected using appropriate collision boundaries

tasks.description: Implement scoring system for star collection
tasks.requirements: Add 50 points when player collects a star, display current score on screen
tasks.test_criteria: Score increases by 50 when star is collected, score is visible and updates correctly

tasks.description: Add game over logic for asteroid/UFO collisions
tasks.requirements: Trigger immediate game over when player touches asteroid or UFO, display game over screen
tasks.test_criteria: Game stops immediately on collision with harmful objects, game over screen appears

tasks.requirements: Increase game speed every 10 seconds to make objects fall faster and spawn more frequently
tasks.test_criteria: Game speed noticeably increases every 10 seconds, difficulty progression is smooth

tasks.description: Add game state management and restart functionality
tasks.requirements: Implement game states (playing, game over), restart button, and score persistence
tasks.test_criteria: Game can be restarted after game over, states transition correctly

tasks.description: Add visual enhancements and UI elements
tasks.requirements: Style game interface, add space background, improve visual feedback, and responsive design
tasks.test_criteria: Game has polished appearance, UI elements are clearly visible, works on different screen sizes

file_structure.description: Simple client-side structure with HTML entry point, CSS styling, and JavaScript game logic
